csl:
<style xmlns="http://purl.org/net/xbiblio/csl"
    class="in-text"
    xml:lang="en"
    version="1.0">
  <info>
    <id></id>
    <title></title>
    <updated>2009-08-10T04:49:00+09:00</updated>
  </info>

    <macro name="blob">
        <text value="I AM A BLOB"/>
    </macro>
    <citation>
        <layout prefix="[" suffix="]" delimiter="; ">
            <names variable="editor">
                <name/>
                <substitute>
                    <names variable="translator"/>
			        <text macro="blob"/>
                </substitute>
            </names>
        </layout>
    </citation>
</style>
